vendors.name: Clay
vendors.description: The leading data enrichment and sales automation platform. Access 100+ data providers in one place with AI-powered research agents. Build prospect lists, enrich leads with company/contact data, automate research workflows, and personalize outreach at scale. Eliminates the need for multiple data subscriptions by providing wholesale access to premium providers.
vendors.tagline: The data enrichment platform for GTM teams
key_capabilities: 100+ data provider integrations in one platform
Job change and news signals monitoring
vendors.use_case_example: Enrich a list of target accounts with decision-maker contacts, verified emails, company funding data, tech stack, and recent news - then use Claygent to research each prospect's specific challenges for hyper-personalized outreach.
best_for: Sales teams needing multi-source data enrichment
GTM teams building hyper-personalized outreach
Revenue operations consolidating data tools
Agencies doing lead research for clients
Teams replacing Apollo + ZoomInfo + Clearbit with one platform
replaces_workflow: Multiple data provider subscriptions (Apollo, ZoomInfo, Clearbit, etc.)
Manual prospect research across LinkedIn, websites, news

ratings.our_notes: Best-in-class data enrichment platform. Consolidates 100+ data sources into one workflow. Credit-based pricing scales well. Essential for any serious outbound sales operation. Top recommendation for sales data enrichment.

vendors.notes: Credit-based system where Pro tier is 7x more cost-effective per credit than Starter. Waterfalling feature tries multiple data providers automatically for best coverage. Claygent AI agent can research prospects automatically.

vendors.name: Outbond
vendors.description: AI-powered prospecting platform that works like ChatGPT for sales. Build lead lists with natural language prompts, find and verify emails, research companies at scale, qualify leads, and generate personalized copy - all in one platform. Replaces the manual prospecting workflow of LinkedIn Navigator + enrichment tools + email copy. Founded by Christian Peverelli (WeAreNoCode).
key_capabilities: Lead qualification and scoring (auto-ICP from website)
vendors.use_case_example: Build me a list of marketing managers at tech companies in Austin, Texas with 11 to 500 employees who recently changed jobs - and it builds the list, finds emails, verifies them, qualifies against your ICP, and generates personalized outreach.
best_for: Sales teams doing outbound prospecting
SDRs wanting to 10x lead research speed
Teams replacing manual LinkedIn + enrichment workflows
High-volume outreach campaigns
vendors.source: WeAreNoCode video Dec 2025, verified via outbond.ai

market_adoption.note: Claimed as 'blue ocean' opportunity - no independent source found to verify this specific percentage

quota_attainment.source: Industry research cited in Spotio, Flowlu

ai_adoption_intent.stat: 81% of sales leaders think AI can help reduce time spent on manual tasks

ai_sales_5step_framework.description: 5-step AI sales process for personalized outreach at scale

steps.name: Lead Building
steps.description: Build hyper-targeted lead lists using signals (job changes, funding, hiring, etc.)
steps.key_insight: Signals like 'recently changed jobs' indicate high intent - they want to make a mark in first 30/60/90 days

steps.name: Enrichment & Research
steps.description: Find contact info (email, phone) and research company details at scale

steps.name: Qualification
steps.description: Score and qualify leads against Ideal Customer Profile (ICP)
steps.key_insight: AI can auto-generate ICP by scraping your website, then score leads automatically

steps.name: Copywriting
steps.description: Generate personalized messages for each lead using research data
steps.key_insight: Reference specific details (their customers, recent events, pain points) for higher response rates

steps.name: Sequencing
steps.description: Execute multi-channel outreach via email and LinkedIn
steps.key_insight: Pair email + LinkedIn for multi-channel coverage

business_model.value_prop: Selling revenue - who doesn't want more customers?
business_model.note: Businesses pay for outcomes, not for learning tools

White-glove onboarding builds your entire revenue engine including scripts, automations, and integrations. Backed by Dan Martell's Martell Ventures.

requirements: Full needs analysis during initial call
